Welcome to the Honeywell Aerospace IDEA Exchange.  The IDEA Exchange provides a forum to allow ALL Aerospace employees to get involved and participate in the success of the business.  You can provide suggestions for improvements to products, services or processes that would help drive revenue growth, increase productivity or improve the customer experience.  In addition to submitting ideas, you can vote and comment on your favorite ideas to ensure they rise to the top.

Here are some basic guidelines for submitting ideas to the IDEA Exchange:

  • Make sure your idea is reasonable and necessary – if you are not sure or cannot articulate the value the improvement would drive do not submit at this time;    you can always come back at a later time.
  • Search for your IDEA before you submit it – keep your community clean and productive by searching before you post.  Make a concerted effort to locate similar ideas and, if they are located, comment on them or suggest to merge.
  • Make Title meaningful - Titles like "product improvement" offer other members little insight to what your Idea is about. Include in the tile: product name, specific functions/business processes, and a brief notion of the issue/limitation.
  • Be clear and concise - When posting an idea, put other members in the best position to judge and respond to them.  Clearly state the specific issue your idea recommends addressing/enhancing. At the same time, make your post reader-friendly by keeping your idea to a few clear sentences.
  • If possible, picture it - Everybody loves colors! Make pretty pictures if you have the time. Conveying your idea visually allows community members to better envision your proposal and will lead to more promotions.
  • Be respectful - A successful community is built upon an open flow of dialogue. It is just as important to critique suggestions as it is to promote them. However, remember that we all seek a stronger more robust Aerospace environment and demeaning, insulting activity only serves to impede that effort. Always keep in mind, it's about Honeywell, not about yourself.
 
Ready to submit an IDEA?  Click on "Post a NEW IDEA" to get started…
